title: Enforce stdout/stderr standards and eliminate logging inconsistencies
description: Despite previous efforts in #66 and #84, significant technical debt remains: 218 print() calls in Python files and 127 console.* calls in TypeScript files. Need to standardize all logging to use sys.stdout.write()/sys.stderr.write() (Python) and process.stdout.write()/process.stderr.write() (TypeScript), then add pre-commit enforcement to prevent regressions.

description: Activate installation token generation and wire it into git operations for private repo cloning

description: Replace local Subscription interface with type from @kotadb/shared (CurrentSubscriptionResponse)
